translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions for the Dhammas

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.40. Sappaccayadukādi, Sanidassanattika🔽Naappaccayaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Naappaccayaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sat paccaya duka ādi sa ni dassana ttika  na appaccayam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sappaccayaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka  na appaccayam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa paccayaḥ anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: (Naappaccayanaanidassanaappaṭighamūlepi ekameva.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽(Nasaṅkhataṁ nasappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: ekam eva hetuyā adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka 🔽na saṅkhatam na sap paccaya sadisa
